amendment.description: To ensure private property is protected as guaranteed by the United States Constitution.

vote.text: Amendment SA 126 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 64 - 33. Record Vote Number: 21.

action.text: Amendment SA 126 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Cornyn to Amendment SA 2. (consideration: CR S391, S396-397) To ensure private property is protected as guaranteed by the United States Constitution.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 126 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Cornyn to Amendment SA 2.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 126 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 64 - 33. Record Vote Number: 21.
